page.title: 15HOTELS
page.content: There are a large number of Hotels in Woolacombe, varying from small guest houses to large 3 Star hotels. The smaller guest houses generally open only during the summer season, but a trend in recent years has been for the larger hotels to extend their season and even remain open virtually all year. The Woolacombe Bay Hotel has developed its facilities to cater not only for holiday makers but also for locals, with squash courts, swimming pools, tennis courts, sauna and solarium and a pitch-and-put course. The Narracott Hotel is a large, modern hotel in the centre of the village, complete with badminton and squash courts and indoor pool. The Coombs Hotel, The Beach, The Watersmeet and The Watersfall are the other main hotels in Woolacombe.
